features: Puncture Guard™ bonded fabric surface is more durable and soft to the touch
47% more puncture-resistant, 25% more stretch-resistant and 30% lighter than a standard Coleman® airbed of the same size
Stronger material lets this bed support up to 800 lbs.
AirTight® system is factory-tested to be leak-free
Wrap 'N' Roll™ built-in storage system – just fold, roll and store
ComfortStrong™ coil construction provides better support for superior comfort
Double Lock™ valve is dual-sealed to be leak-free
For use outdoors while camping or indoors as an extra bed
Approximate Inflated Dimensions: 78 x 58 x 8 in.
All Coleman® airbed pumps recommended (sold separately)
